  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FilterComponentType
    Enum that describes type of component where can be used the filter
    FilterDataType
    Enum that describes the different data types of a filter.
    FilterFieldType
    Enum that describes type of field used in filter widget
    FilterReportType
    Enum that describes the different report types of a filter (where it can be visible).
    FilterType
    Enum that describes the different types of filter.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ApiMethod
    This class has three responsibilities: Expose endpoint methods using id & name properties Authorize calls to endpoint methods using authTypes property Expose filters using the rest of the properties
    FilterDefinition
    This class is used for exposing filters using the rest of the properties
